title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 116.1 - Covered entities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 116.1 - Covered entities

State Regulations
(a) This Part shall apply to all "banking
organizations" and "foreign banking corporations."
(b) The term banking organization shall have
the meaning ascribed to it in section 2 of the New York Banking Law. (c) The term foreign banking corporation
shall mean any branch, agency or representative office located in New York

State of a foreign banking corporation licensed to maintain such a facility
under article V or article V-B of the Banking Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
116.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
